name: Magnetic Platformer
description:
From Burning Burrito Games, comes Magnetic Platformer

In this game you control a robot on their quest to go through the portals. Why are they going through the portals? Do you think that we know? Honestly come on who do you think we are? If you really think we know why the robot does what he does then you're asking the wrong people.

Available for PC, Mac, and Linux
